trans-unit.source: Represents the XPath transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: Representa a transformação de XPath para uma assinatura digital, conforme definida pelo W3C.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class allows you to address an XML document using the XPath language.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe permite que você resolver um documento XML usando a linguagem XPath.

trans-unit.source: This class uses an XPath expression to select the XML nodes you want to sign or encrypt while removing all others from either cryptographic operation.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe usa uma expressão XPath para selecionar os nós XML que você deseja assinar ou criptografar ao remover todos os outros usuários de qualquer operação de criptografia.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe para assinar ou criptografar partes específicas de um documento XML usando uma expressão XPath.

trans-unit.source: For information on initializing the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class to the value of an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como inicializar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> de classe para o valor de uma cadeia de caracteres XPath transformação, consulte o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: O URI Uniform Resource Identifier () que descreve o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe é definida pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl> campo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XPath transform, see Section 6.6.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a transformação do XPath, consulte a seção 6.6.3 da especificação XMLDSIG, que está disponível a partir do W3C em www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: Esta seção contém dois exemplos de código.

trans-unit.source: The first code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro exemplo de código mostra como assinar e verificar um documento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe com uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: This example signs an XML document and saves the signature in a new XML document.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo assina um documento XML e salva a assinatura em um novo documento XML.

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to call members of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: O segundo exemplo de código demonstra como chamar membros de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: **Example #1**
trans-unit.target: **Exemplo 1 #**

trans-unit.source: **Example #2**
trans-unit.target: **Exemplo 2 #**

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como assinar e verificar um documento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example creates an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo cria uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação XML dos parâmetros de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> adequados para serem incluídos como subelementos de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object in an XMLDSIG <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de nós XML que representa o conteúdo específico da transformação necessário para descrever o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual em um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> XMLDSIG.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> objeto que contém uma representação XML de uma transformação de XPath.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto retornado deve ser <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> objeto que contém uma representação XML de uma transformação de XPath.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve the output of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar a saída do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de saída a ser retornada.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> é o único tipo válido para esse parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual do tipo <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object of type <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.
trans-unit.target: A saída do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual do tipo <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto retornado deve ser <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> objeto que contém uma representação XML de uma transformação de XPath.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> method to retrieve the output of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput%2A> método para recuperar a saída do atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="type" /> não é um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são entradas válidas para o método <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> method of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de entrada válidas para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> objeto; você pode passar apenas os objetos de um desses tipos para o <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput(System.Object)" /> método atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de entrada válida para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> são <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> property to retrieve the valid input types for the current transform.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade para recuperar os tipos de entrada válidos para a transformação atual.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> a ser carregado no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> object as transform-specific content of a <see langword="<Transform>" /> element and configures the internal state of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object to match the <see langword="<Transform>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Analisa o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNodeList" /> especificado como conteúdo específico da transformação de um elemento <see langword="<Transform>" /> e configura o estado interno do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual para corresponder ao elemento <see langword="<Transform>" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method to initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> método para inicializar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe com uma transformação de XPath.

trans-unit.source: To initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform, complete the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Para inicializar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe com uma transformação de XPath, conclua as etapas a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> class and set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property to the value of an XPath transform string.
trans-unit.target: Criar um novo <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> de classe e defina o <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> propriedade para o valor de uma cadeia de caracteres de transformação de XPath.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that represents the transform.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> método para criar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> objeto que representa a transformação.

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class and pass the previously created <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Criar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe e passar criado anteriormente <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> o objeto para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como assinar e verificar um documento XML usando o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: This sample creates an envelope signature.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo cria uma assinatura de envelope.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="nodeList" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="nodeList" /> parameter does not contain an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> element.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="nodeList" /> não contém um elemento <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" />.

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: A entrada a ser carregada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Carrega a entrada especificada no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A> method to initialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object to the value of an XPath transform using an <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A> método para inicializar um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> objeto para o valor de uma transformação de XPath usando um <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, ou <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For information about initializing an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object using an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como inicializar um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> objeto usando uma cadeia de caracteres XPath transformação, consulte o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto de entrada deve ser um dos tipos de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A> method using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object as the input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput%2A> método usando especificado <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> objeto como entrada.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma matriz de tipos que são possíveis saídas provenientes de métodos <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object; the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> object return only objects of one of these types.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de tipos de saída válido para o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> objeto; o <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput" /> métodos do atual <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform" /> retorno somente objetos de um desses tipos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> é o tipo de saída só é válida para <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.OutputTypes%2A> property to retrieve the valid output types for the current transform.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.OutputTypes%2A> propriedade para recuperar os tipos de saída válido para a transformação atual.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> classe.
